results.name: Cross-Session Recall
results.description: Validates semantic recall of policy decisions across sessions with paraphrased queries

steps.description: Session 1 (Tuesday): User states language constraint with decision record ID and nonce

response.response:
Understood. Based on the information provided in the decision record, the following key points can be synthesized:

1. The project team has decided to use Java exclusively for the integration project, and rejected the use of Python [#1].
2. This decision is final and should not be re-opened [#2].

fullResult.input: Decision Record DR-091 (Nonce X4K2): We rejected Python for this integration project. We must use Java only. Do not re-open this decision.

observe.input: Decision Record DR-091 (Nonce X4K2): We rejected Python for this integration project. We must use Java only. Do not re-open this decision.
